channel.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
channel.description:
[B][u]Introduction:[/u][/b] Hey MoparScape, I recently began a project called [I]Rocket Power[/i] based off DeltaScape. I chose Delta because it is something I'm comfortable with and I believe I can create something great from it. There are only a very few Delta servers out there that are worth playing, seeing as most of them lack creativity. When I look for a server I look for content that grabs my attention. By this I mean I ask myself 'Would I enjoy this mini-game?' or something along the lines of that. I hate it when I play servers similar to one another, I'm sure most of you do as well. With this being said, I hope to create a one-of-a-kind server that everyone loves and enjoys. I will make sure there is always something to do.
[B][u]Goals:[/u][/b] As of now my goals are simple;
[ul][li]Implement unique content: -Mini-Games -Quests -Skills[/li] [li]Clean up dead code[/li] [li]Package the server[/li] [li]Improve all skills[/li][/ul]
I will improve/list more goals as my server moves further into development.
[B][u]Media:[/u][/b] Media coming within 48-72 hours.
[B][u]Updates:[/u][/b] [Code=update] 11/8/11 - Project started [/code]
[B][u]Questions:[/u][/b] How did you come up with your project name?:
- Well, rocket power was a show I watched when I was a kid. It was about a group of friends skateboarding/surfing and quite frankly, I wanted to be like them. (Even though it was animated)
Do you plan on hosting this?:
- If the development goes as planned, yes I do. I have the funds and everything else it takes in order to run a successful server.
Thanks for reading about my development. Just stick with me, I will continue to improve this thread daily! If you have any questions or concerns, please comment below, and don't forget to support RP!

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Rocket_Power:

Team_Rocket: I’ve already read your skilling concept dump earlier today, and if you don’t mind I will be implementing a few of your ideas.

Feel free to. That’s why they’re there. If you need advice or help - you may send me a Private Message on these Forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:12, topic:467031”][quote author=Rocket_Power link=topic=583964.msg4155686#msg4155686 date=1352671303]

Find it unlikely that you will go far with Delta, nevertheless good luck.

Care to explain? I’d love to hear your thoughts.
[/quote]

I see Delta as a learning source. It was my first one and I encountered countless errors, on almost every delta source I found. Also, a lot of delta’s seem to have customs in them, and admittedly- You could just take them out, but some owners do not.

All in all, I just don’t think Delta is great for it’s stability, or features. But if you can pull it off then kudos to you.[/quote]
DalaCity, then talk.

Read full topic
item.source: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Rocket_Power, post:16, topic:467031”]I’m aware that Delta is very unstable due to everything being crammed into the client class. I’m not a complete moron, I just wanted to hear it from his POV.

With this being said, I will continue to improve the stability of RP as time progresses. I plan on having each and every skill handled separately in the next few weeks.

Does anyone have any suggestions for me, content-wise?[/quote]

Be creative and put effort into it.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @Rocket_Power Rocket_Power
item.description:
@Rocket_Power wrote:

I’m aware that Delta is very unstable due to everything being crammed into the client class. I’m not a complete moron, I just wanted to hear it from his POV.

With this being said, I will continue to improve the stability of RP as time progresses. I plan on having each and every skill handled separately in the next few weeks.

Does anyone have any suggestions for me, content-wise?

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Rocket_Power, post:13, topic:467031”]Delta’s stability isn’t that great opposed to PI? Is that what you’re trying to tell me? I’m assuming so since your project is PI based.

Anyway, thanks for the support, I appreciate it.[/quote]Depends on the Networking but generally an untouched PI is better stability wise then an untouched Delta because Delta has everything crammed into one class and is a cluster fuck. PI’s can be a lot more stable if you update the MINA networking or implement new networking.

Read full topic

[quote=“Rocket_Power, post:11, topic:467031”][quote author=pasta186 link=topic=583964.msg4155666#msg4155666 date=1352669967]
Find it unlikely that you will go far with Delta, nevertheless good luck.
[/quote]
Care to explain? I’d love to hear your thoughts.[/quote]

I see Delta as a learning source. It was my first one and I encountered countless errors, on almost every delta source I found. Also, a lot of delta’s seem to have customs in them, and admittedly- You could just take them out, but some owners do not.

All in all, I just don’t think Delta is great for it’s stability, or features. But if you can pull it off then kudos to you.

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @Rocket_Power Rocket_Power
item.description:
@Rocket_Power wrote:

[quote=“PvPXile, post:8, topic:467031”]Tip - Use notepad as your logs.

OT:I doubt you’ll get far without a team[/quote]
I do use notepad as my logs. I will copy and paste them here for everyone to see.

That’s a poorly thought out accusation. Usually when someone doesn’t have enough time on their hands, they put together a team. I have all the time in the world, I’m not going to half-ass this project. Before I even consider releasing this I will make sure It’s up to my standards, and those are pretty high.

Don’t you have a server in development?

Read full topic

PvPXile:

Do you need content developers?

No. I wish for RP to be a solo project. However, I might change my mind as I get further into the development, if I do I will create a development team thread.

Also, disregard the update log for now. I have been keeping all of my updates in a word document, I will paste them in the log later today or tomorrow.

item.title: Rocket Power [RP] - Skate and be free!
item.dc:creator: @Rocket_Power Rocket_Power
item.description:
@Rocket_Power wrote:

Introduction:
Hey MoparScape, I recently began a project called Rocket Power based off DeltaScape. I chose Delta because it is something I’m comfortable with and I believe I can create something great from it. There are only a very few Delta servers out there that are worth playing, seeing as most of them lack creativity. When I look for a server I look for content that grabs my attention. By this I mean I ask myself ‘Would I enjoy this mini-game?’ or something along the lines of that. I hate it when I play servers similar to one another, I’m sure most of you do as well. With this being said, I hope to create a one-of-a-kind server that everyone loves and enjoys. I will make sure there is always something to do.

Goals:
As of now my goals are simple;

[ul][li]Implement unique content:
-Mini-Games
-Quests
-Skills[/li]
[li]Clean up dead code[/li]
[li]Package the server[/li]
[li]Improve all skills[/li][/ul]

I will improve/list more goals as my server moves further into development.

Media:
Media coming within 48-72 hours.

Updates:

11/8/11 - Project started

Questions:
How did you come up with your project name?:

  • Well, rocket power was a show I watched when I was a kid. It was about a group of friends skateboarding/surfing and quite frankly, I wanted to be like them. (Even though it was animated)

Do you plan on hosting this?:

  • If the development goes as planned, yes I do. I have the funds and everything else it takes in order to run a successful server.

Thanks for reading about my development. Just stick with me, I will continue to improve this thread daily! If you have any questions or concerns, please comment below, and don’t forget to support RP!
